Title: Country
Description: The country where the weather data is recorded.

Title: Location Name
Description: The name of the location (e.g., city, town, or region).

Title: Latitude
Description: The latitude coordinate of the location, ranging from -90 to 90 degrees.

Title: Longitude
Description: The longitude coordinate of the location, ranging from -180 to 180 degrees.

Title: Timezone
Description: The timezone of the location where the data is recorded.

Title: Last Updated (Epoch)
Description: The Unix timestamp indicating the last time the data was updated.

Title: Last Updated (Local Time)
Description: The local time when the weather data was last updated.

Title: Temperature (Celsius)
Description: The temperature recorded at the location, measured in degrees Celsius.

Title: Temperature (Fahrenheit)
Description: The temperature recorded at the location, measured in degrees Fahrenheit.

Title: Weather Condition
Description: A description of the current weather condition (e.g., "Sunny," "Partly Cloudy," "Rainy").

Title: Wind Speed (mph)
Description: The wind speed measured in miles per hour (mph).

Title: Wind Speed (kph)
Description: The wind speed measured in kilometers per hour (kph).

Title: Wind Direction (Degree)
Description: The direction the wind is coming from, measured in degrees (0° to 360°).

Title: Wind Direction (Text)
Description: The direction of the wind in cardinal directions (e.g., N, NE, SW).

Title: Pressure (mb)
Description: The atmospheric pressure measured in millibars (mb).

Title: Pressure (inches)
Description: The atmospheric pressure measured in inches.

Title: Precipitation (mm)
Description: The amount of precipitation (rainfall or snowfall) measured in millimeters.

Title: Precipitation (inches)
Description: The amount of precipitation measured in inches.

Title: Humidity
Description: The relative humidity, represented as a percentage (0–100).

Title: Cloud Cover
Description: The percentage of the sky covered by clouds (0–100).

Title: Feels Like (Celsius)
Description: The "feels like" temperature in degrees Celsius, taking into account factors such as wind chill and humidity.

Title: Feels Like (Fahrenheit)
Description: The "feels like" temperature in degrees Fahrenheit, accounting for wind chill and humidity.

Title: Visibility (km)
Description: The visibility distance, measured in kilometers.

Title: Visibility (miles)
Description: The visibility distance, measured in miles.

Title: UV Index
Description: The ultraviolet (UV) radiation index, representing the risk of harm from sun exposure.

Title: Wind Gust (mph)
Description: The maximum wind gust speed, measured in miles per hour.

Title: Wind Gust (kph)
Description: The maximum wind gust speed, measured in kilometers per hour.

Title: Air Quality: Carbon Monoxide
Description: The concentration of carbon monoxide (CO) in the air, measured in micrograms per cubic meter (µg/m³).

Title: Air Quality: Ozone
Description: The concentration of ozone (O₃) in the air, measured in micrograms per cubic meter (µg/m³).

Title: Air Quality: Nitrogen Dioxide
Description: The concentration of nitrogen dioxide (NO₂) in the air, measured in micrograms per cubic meter (µg/m³).

Title: Air Quality: Sulphur Dioxide
Description: The concentration of sulfur dioxide (SO₂) in the air, measured in micrograms per cubic meter (µg/m³).

Title: Air Quality: PM2.5
Description: The concentration of fine particulate matter (PM2.5) in the air, measured in micrograms per cubic meter (µg/m³).

Title: Air Quality: PM10
Description: The concentration of coarse particulate matter (PM10) in the air, measured in micrograms per cubic meter (µg/m³).

Title: Air Quality: US EPA Index
Description: The air quality index (AQI) as defined by the US Environmental Protection Agency (EPA).

Title: Air Quality: GB DEFRA Index
Description: The air quality index (AQI) as defined by the UK's Department for Environment, Food & Rural Affairs (DEFRA).

Title: Sunrise Time
Description: The local time when the sun rises at the location.

Title: Sunset Time
Description: The local time when the sun sets at the location.

Title: Moonrise Time
Description: The local time when the moon rises at the location.

Title: Moonset Time
Description: The local time when the moon sets at the location.

Title: Moon Phase
Description: The current phase of the moon (e.g., New Moon, Full Moon, Waxing Crescent).

Title: Moon Illumination Percentage
Description: The percentage of the moon that is illuminated.
